reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Promoting the development of smart grids by implementing Advanced Metering Infrastructure in Colombia

description.narrative: Structuring a programme for the implementation of Advanced Metering Infrastructure (AMI), including its associated ownership structure, for the Colombian electricity sector in order to facilitate integration of renewable energy technology at optimal cost, provide new services to customers and further the development of smart cities.
